name: Speedolor
description:
Adjust your speed to match the indicated color in time.

Controls:

Alternate between Z and X - Accelerate (You can also spam the buttons...)

Alternate between N and M - Slow Down (You can also spam the buttons...)

Left Shift - Toggle Help

ESC - Pause the game

The game might become impossible at some point, so beware.

Game made for XAMK Game Jam 2021.
